name: 彭馨儀
objective: 本課程介紹研究方法和論文寫作知識，期能培養學生獨立研究和撰寫學術報告、論文的基本能力。主要分為三部份：（一）研究內涵與步驟,（二）主要的研究方法,（三）如何撰寫英文論文及報告。涵蓋主題包括：運用圖書館資源選擇研究主題、研究計劃的撰寫、問卷調查法、訪問法、觀察法、田野工作研究方法、文獻資料分析法（內容分析法）、個案研究法、相關研究法、實驗法、文學研究法，研究報告論文格式與寫作要領，如何撰寫文獻探討，參考書目寫法等。
schedule:
Week 1/10—An Introduction to Research
Week 2/11—Choosing A Topic
Week3/12—Identifying and Using Library Sources
Week4/13—Using the Internet for Research
Week5/14—Recording Information
Week6/15—Composing and Revising 
Week7/16—Producing the Final Paper
Week8/17—Documenting Sources Using MLA style
Week9/18—End-of-Course Examination
scorePolicy:
1.　　Attendance and Class Participation: 30%
2.　　Homework: 30%
3.　　End-of-Course Examination: 40%
materials:
Walker, Melissa. Writing Research Paper: A Norton Guide, 4th ed. NY: Norton, 1997. 

Gibaldi, Joseph. MLA Handbook for Writers of Research Papers, 6th ed. NY: MLA, 1999.
